answerText: Satire VI[10] This Roman poet included detailed discussion of the mores and traditions of Roman society in his Satires.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 4 | 9 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this poem written as a diatribe against marriage and women. It includes the famous line "Sed quis custodiet ipsos custodes?", or "But who will guard the guards themselves?"
